semantics.label: Messages
semantics.description: This is a list of messages that will be displayed in the chat.

fields.label: Default background color
fields.description: This is the default background color for the left side of the chat. It will be used if no specific background color is set for a message.

fields.label: Icon image
fields.description: This image will be used as icon for the left side of the chat. It should have a square aspect ratio and does not need to exceed 64x64 pixels.

fields.label: User name
fields.description: This is the user name that will be displayed for the left side of the chat.

fields.label: Default background color
fields.description: This is the default background color for the right side of the chat. It will be used if no specific background color is set for a message.

fields.label: Icon image
fields.description: This image will be used as icon for the right side of the chat. It should have a square aspect ratio and needn't exceed 64x64 pixels.

fields.label: User name
fields.description: This is the user name that will be displayed for the right side of the chat.

fields.label: Show player bar
fields.description: If enabled, a player bar will be shown at the bottom of the chat to allow the user to control the chat. It makes sense to set a maximum/fixed height for the chat if the player bar is enabled.

fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: Maximum chat height in pixels. Chat will grow up to this height and then add a scrollbar. Set to 0 for no height limit.

fields.label: Fixed height
fields.description: Fixed chat height in pixels. Chat will always use this height exactly and use a scrollbar if required.

fields.label: No messages
fields.description: Text to be shown if the chat has not been started yet.

fields.label: No messages supplied
fields.description: Text to be shown if no messages were supplied by the author.
fields.default: The author did not supply any messages.

fields.label: No message text supplied
fields.description: Message text if author did not supply any.

fields.label: New message from
fields.description: @username is a placeholder that will be replaced with the actual user name of the sender if set.
